trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of child elements, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de elementos filho ou <see langword="null" />, se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> estiver vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the word "TextBlock".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a palavra "TextBlock".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" /> is something that the end user would understand as being interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBlockAutomationPeer" /> é algo que o usuário final entenderia como sendo interativo ou como contribuindo para a estrutura lógica do controle no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the element is part of a template; otherwise <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> se o elemento for parte de um modelo; caso contrário, <see langword="true" />.
